page.title: 15Local dialect
page.content: Dialect names of houses Hazel Head _ There are hazel trees there. Travellers Rest _ There was a pub at the bottom of the hill called Travellers Rest. Browfoot _ Foot of the hill. Bobbin Mill _ Where bobbins were made. River Bank _ On the bank of the river. Bridge End _ End of the bridge. School House _ House for school teachers. Dialect words Stone - styan Yes - aye Gate - yat Leap - lowp Byre - shuppen Tup - tip Lovely - bonny Get - git Little - laal Great - gurt One - yan Four - fower Home - yam or yem Go - gan Nothing - nowt
